Mentor Guide:
You can take up to 3 Students. For each increase in the level of the Student, the Mentor receives an item called Mark of a Disciple. After the rebirth of these signs can be exchanged for useful items.From the 1st to the 50th level of registration shall be issued every 10 levels, and 51 level mail comes after each increase. When get by mail Mark, be sure to remove the letter. If the mailbox becomes full, the item will not be delivered.
If the Mentor and Student in the game, both have powerful positive effects. The student also gets the effects, influencing the increase of experience and SP. If during the mentoring to be reborn, it will end automatically. If, after the end show me the Certificate of the Ward, I will trade it for a Certificate of Completion. The certificate allows you to buy a variety of items.
